column1: Balaghat is a city and a municipality in Balaghat district  in the state of Madhya Pradesh
column2: India. It is the administrative headquarters of Balaghat District. Wainganga River flows beside the town.

column1: Balaghat is located at 21°48′N 80°11′E. It has an average elevation of 288 metres (944 feet).
